text: Ana ngakuiona yanti Allah akwendesya mawunde gawula mwambolembole kaneka ni kugalumbikanya yalumo, kaneko ni kugaŵika maunjilimaunjili, basi ni nkujionaga wula jili nkukopoka chilikati chakwecho, soni akutulusyaga kuumila kwinani - m’matumbi (gamatalila) - mwelemo (akutulusyaga) matalila, basi ni akasamputa nago jwansachile ni kugaŵambasya ku jwansachile. Kumulika kwa kumesya kwakwe kukusigalaga panandi kuti kutyosye kulola
